name: dungeon6
description:
Theme of the GMTK Game Jam was "Roll of the Die" so we  decided to make a dungeon crawl. The rooms are randomly generated and are created depending on your roll!

Play as a wizard in a randomly created dungeon. Each room you clear, you receive a die that you can roll. Test your luck and hope you find the End Room.

Contributors
Dyson Fyke
Kenneth Easter
Thanh Bui
